name: Marcin Karol Kotlinski
profile_summary:
Results-driven Senior Web Engineer with 8 years of extensive experience in developing high-performance web applications. Proficient in **JavaScript**, **TypeScript**, **React**, **Vue.js**, **Node.js**, **HTML5**, **CSS3**, and modern frameworks including **jQuery**, **Gulp**, and **Webpack**. Strong background in Behavior-Driven Development enhances team collaboration and project outcomes. I leverage **Git** for efficient version control and maintain code quality through the implementation of best practices.

My experience includes building seamless user interfaces and robust back-end services, ensuring cross-functional functionality and scalability. I excel at integrating responsive design principles and optimizing applications for performance and accessibility. I have a proven track record in delivering enterprise-level solutions, particularly in areas requiring compliance with industry standards. My strengths also encompass the use of CI/CD pipelines that foster continuous integration and delivery, along with solid exposure to cloud platforms like **Azure** and **AWS**. I am dedicated to driving innovation and efficiency while engaging in collaborative, agile environments.
